(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHNP (WRB How) (RB not))
    (S
      (VP (TO to)
        (VP (VB try)
          (NP
            (NP (NN something))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT that))
              (S
                (VP (VBZ is)
                  (NP (DT both)
                    (NP (DT a) (NNP Makansutra) (NNP Legend))
                    (CONJP (RB as) (RB well) (IN as))
                    (NP (DT a) (NN place)))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHADVP (WRB where))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBD was)
                        (VP (VBN taken)
                          (PP (TO to)
                            (SBAR
                              (WHADVP (WRB when))
                              (S
                                (NP (PRP he))
                                (VP (VBD was)
                                  (PP (IN in)
                                    (NP (NNP Singapore))))))))))))))))))
    (. ?)))

aux(try-4, to-3)

dep(Legend-11, both-8)
